text: (Yemwe Bayisilamu) muvuge muti “Twemeye Allah n’ibyo twahishuriwe, n’ibyahishuriwe Aburahamu (Ibrahimu), Ishimayeli (Ismail), Isaka (Is’haq), Yakobo (Yaqub) n’urubyaro rwe, ibyahishuriwe Musa, ibyahishuriwe Yesu (Issa) ndetse n’ibyahishuriwe abahanuzi biturutse kwa Nyagasani wabo. Nta n’umwe tuvangura muri bo kandi ni We twicishaho bugufi.”
